episodes.title: Why a Mormon Mega-Temple is Being Dug-Up
episodes.description:
This Salt Lake City Temple is being dug up... so it can be saved.
Download the Straight Arrow News app by clicking here 👉 https://www.san.com/b1m to stay informed with Unbiased. Straight Facts.

🔥 Pre-order Fred's book MEGA BUILDS now 👉 https://bit.ly/3Y63G6X

Full story here - https://theb1m.com/video/why-a-mormon-mega-temple-is-being-dug-up

00:00 - Intro
01:03 - A hefty building
02:26 - Lessons from New Zealand
05:20 - How to dig up a Temple
08:50 - This building is a declaration
11:44 - The birth of Salt Lake City
14:00 - The past is present

Additional footage and images: Church News Room, The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, NBC Universal, Channel 4 News, Daniel Lademan, The Telegram and Christ Church Cathedral Reinstatement Project.

For more by The B1M subscribe now 👉 https://bit.ly/the-b1m

We're raising awareness of construction's mental health crisis through our Get Construction Talking initiative. There’s a video series on our channel and you can find support or donate at - https://www.getconstructiontalking.org/
